text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump If this coronavirus is as bad and lethal as they say, why aren’t all the doctors and nurses at the hospitals dropping dead or deathly sick ? Is a mask and gloves completely blocking the spread of this catastrophe on society ? didn’t Fauci say mask wouldn’t work ? Open the COUNTRY
